text: Can anyone help me with the Ecommerse Bridge API, according to new HubSpot policy changes, we need to define the unique identifiers ?
You realize that the endpoint is sunsetting on December 1, right?

Hello team, I am working on a feature for our customers to send a message to our team, this should go to a specific Conversations > Inbox - Can someone point me to right API to POST those messages? Thank you
hello team, Can I get guidance on an API to send a test email via api

currently its possible to access an protected image by inserting an apikey as a query parameter (<https://path.to.file.jpg?apikey=###>) is there any equivalent to this once HS removes apikeys. I'm currently using these urls with the files import-from-url api endpoint so I cannot see a way to path authorization through using an accesstoken and I also do not have access to the fileID to use a different endpoint
<@U01QVR44MEY> Yes exactly, can you help me out with this ?
